document_data.name: Sand Kings
document_data.mainbody: The '''Sand Kings''' were a rebel [[Bedine]] group in [[Anauroch]] around [[1479 DR]]. The Sand Kings opposed the [[shadovar]]'s domination of Anauroch.
document_data.Activities: Usually the Sand Kings used hit-and-run skirmishes against shadovar patrols and supply convoys but sometimes they devised more complex plots.
document_data.History: In 1479 DR, a Sand Kings group led by the mystic [[Ashurta]] tried to stop a shadovar plot to gain control of the [[Spiral Gate]] [[portal nexus]].{{Cite dungeon/180/The Spiral Gate|4-33}}
